intro.title: Hello!
intro.text:
My name is Simone Timi, I'm a full stack web developer and former speech pathologist with a passion for tech and linguistics.

Let's swap out the articulation cards for some fresh lines of code!

about.title: About me
about.text:
I am a software developer who transitioned from a career in speech pathology to the  world of web development. Today, I specialize in building enterprise applications.

My passion for technology and problem-solving has always been a driving force. From the moment I started web development, I was captivated by the process of turning ideas into concrete projects.

Now, I work in a team to design and implement robust, scalable applications that meet diverse needs. While my journey into software development is unconventional, the skills I honed in my previous career have proven invaluable in this field.

project1.title: Blog App
project1.text: Full stack project with secure authentication and MongoDB integration. Written entirely in TypeScript with Next.js.

project2.title: Message Board
project2.text: App for posting and reading messages, with secure authentication. Backend developed with Express.

project3.title: Weather App
project3.text: Minimalistic weather app with 7-days forecast. Originally written in JavaScript and re-written in Typescript.

project4.title: Token Bag App
project4.text: Simple companion app for the RPG-game Koriko. It offers the ability to save the user's session on local storage. Written in React and Next.js.

project5.title: Pok√©mon Memory Game
project5.text: Memory game where the player must never click on the same Pok√©mon twice. Written in React.

project6.title: Portfolio
project6.text: This very portfolio is written in TypeScript/React with Next.js.

project7.title: Trivia Quiz App
project7.text: Configurable trivia quiz app. Saves player's name and best score on local storage.

project8.title: Next.js Full Stack template with Auth.js e Prisma
project8.text: Template Full Stack for making web apps using th next.js framework, the auth.js for authenticating and managing the user's session, and Prisma ORM for connecting a database.

project9.title: Cattify: Google Chrome extension
project9.text: Google Chrome extension for replacing the word "cat" and its variants into the üêà emoji. Support English, Italian and Estonian.

project10.title: E-commerce product page
project10.text: Fully responsive mockup of an eCommerce product page. It features automatic and manual dark mode. Made with Angular.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: I'm always excited to connect with like-minded individuals and explore new collaborations. If you have an idea, project, or opportunity that aligns with my expertise, I'd love to hear from you!
